input.sentences: it was the first day of vacation bible school | and the volunteers were ready for the kids to arrive .
they started out with fun songs to get the children motivated .
the children gathered round as ashuman told the story of [male] and the whale .
after two hours of crafts | playtime | stories | and music | then children came together for a group photo .
[male] 's favorite part of the day was going home with a special bag of treats and trinkets .
output.sentences: We always love what we do as volunteers during our vacation to help this school.
Our first day started by motivating all kids by singing songs all together.
One of my friend's read them all a beautiful whale story which they were so amazed about.
All kids had their own little stories they brought along as we also took many group photos.
To conclude our visiting day at the school all kids received well deserved special trinkets and treats.
